summary: BougeRV has released an LED lantern designed for outdoor activities that can also be used as a work lamp. The lantern is rechargeable, compact, and doubles as a durable flashlight.

title: Researchers identify mutations that can lead to resistance to some chemotherapies
snippets: Researchers have discovered that mutations in VPS35, a critical component in the pathway that uses reactive oxygen species (ROS) to eliminate cancer cells, can lead to resistance against chemotherapy treatments. This finding may aid in identifying tumors that are resistant to treatment.
summary: Researchers found that mutations in VPS35, a key part of the process that uses reactive oxygen species (ROS) to destroy cancer cells, can cause resistance to chemotherapy. This discovery could help identify tumors that won't respond to treatment.
